articles.title: Jason Momoa shuts down Kate Beckinsale dating rumors: 'Absolutely not, not together' - Fox News
articles.description: Jason Momoa put rumors to rest after the "Aquaman" star was spotted giving his jacket to Kate Beckinsale following the Vanity Fair Oscar party in March.
articles.content:
Jason Momoa is putting rumors to rest.
